ygData.subject: Re: Memmed spells
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to be in the first view mode to do it... Mr. J Daniels
ygData.messageBody:
You have to be in the first view mode to do it...

Mr. J Daniels


On Tue, 22 Jun 1999 voodoo@... wrote:

> From: voodoo@...
>
> I have a silly question. Been trying to figure out how
> people are putting spells in there lower left hand hot key
> slots. I've tried doing it the way you put other things
> there, i.e. left click and holding, but that just casts the
> spell. I have also tried memming that spell to the hot keys
> but that doesnt work either. I know there is something
> simple I'm missing so PLEASE let me know
>
> Thanks
>
> LATE
>
> Karak of Kaladim 15th lvl Cleric (Innoruuk)
